{{/* huge/env/GetVar Returns an environment variable from getenv or _huge/config/env.yaml @author @regisphilibert @context String @access public @uses - huge/config/Get @returns String */}} {{ $var := "" }} {{ with getenv . }} {{ $var = . }} {{ else }} {{ with partialCached "huge/config/Get" "env" "env" }} {{ with index . $ }} {{ $var = . }} {{ end }} {{ end }} {{ end }} {{ return $var }}
